Package com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class AWSMailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailSender
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.AWSMailSender
  • public class AWSMailSender
extends EmailSender
    Class to send emails using Amazon Web Services (AWS) SES.

      private long mWaitIntervalMillis
      Amount of milliseconds to wait when next email must be sent if quota is exceeded.

      • mCheckQuotaAfterMillis

        private volatile long mCheckQuotaAfterMillis
        Indicates amount of milliseconds to check quota of mail sending returned by Amazon. This is used to prevent Amazon SES throttling.

        Timestamps of last sent email.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AWSMailSender

        private AWSMailSender()
        Constructor. Loads mail configuration, and if it fails for some reason, mail sending becomes disabled.
